channel.title: Jar signer error
channel.description: Whenever I jar and sign my client, I think I did it correctly, I try to open my client and it gives me a full screen white box that looks like a jared client. My client is not full screen, although I don't know if it has that capability. I have jared and signed a client before with no problems. I don't know what is going on. Any help is appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Jar signer error
item.dc:creator: @Nikotrix Nikotrix
item.description:
@Nikotrix wrote:

When i was done Jarring & Signing, and tryed to open my client nothing happend. I try to do it a few times but the client wont come up to the screen.
Why is it like this? and how can i upload the client to a html website

Read full topic

item.title: Jar signer error
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Whenever I jar and sign my client, I think I did it correctly, I try to open my client and it gives me a full screen white box that looks like a jared client. My client is not full screen, although I don’t know if it has that capability. I have jared and signed a client before with no problems. I don’t know what is going on. Any help is appreciated. Thanks.

Read full topic
